alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Haywood; Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 15 at 9:56PM CST until February 15 at 10:30PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CST FOR NORTHERN FAYETTE...SOUTHWESTERN HAYWOOD AND EAST CENTRAL SHELBY COUNTIES... At 956 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Eads, or 10 miles east of Cordova, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Arlington, Somerville, Eads, Warren, Oakland, Stanton, Braden, Yum Yum, Fisherville, Belmont, Canadaville, Longtown, Moorman, Taylor Chapel, Lambert, Hickory Withe, Powers, Griffen, Meux Corner and Keeling. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for west Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
